title: Train fault causing delays towards Bukit Panjang on Service A

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致A号线往武吉班让方向延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan ke arah Bukit Panjang di Perkhidmatan A
title_translations.ta: தொடக்கம் A இல் புகிட் பாஞ்சாங் நோக்கி தாமதங்களை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [BPLRT] Update: Normal train services progressively resumed from 8am. We are sorry for the earlier late tweet.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Additional 5mins train travel time from #BukitPanjang to #Senja on Service B due to a train fault.
[BPLRT]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower towards #ChoaChuKang on Service B. We are investigating the fault.
[BPLRT]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower towards #BukitPanjang on Service A. We are investigating the fault.
